title: Spell shields don't stack
body: Let's say a {{champion:25}}  shielded your  {{champion:15}}  shields or {{champion:90}} passive and they also have an {{item:3814}}  and {{item:3102}} all of them up,and then she steps on {{champion:51}}or {{champion:76}}   trap and all of them are just popped is this intended? Because I fiddled around with {{item:3102}}  and {{item:3814}}  and both popped by one {{champion:110}} q even though it looks like they stack, but don't. If you aren't fixing it at least state it doesn't stack or something kinda like the {{item:3156}}  and {{item:3053}}  stacking.

replies.body:
Hmm, for quite some time they have been behaving like that. Apparently they don't have any prioritization besides Morg's E (i.e A magic damage, crowd control spell won't proc Sivir's/Noc/Banshee's if shielded by Morgs E. I suspect a Physical damage spell would, however.)

So, in the end:

* {{champion:15}} {{champion:56}} {{item:3102}}  {{item:3814}} spell shields pop up at the same time, not taking prioritization at all, regardless if they've been hit by a single spell or two.

{{item:3632}} also, wth. What's this item? XD

Thanks for answering, that blows they don't stack, it'd be nice seeing in your match 10 people with spell shield champs with {{item:3814}} {{item:3102}} just blowing all of their ults doing nothing and autoing each other.
For {{item:3632}} , This is a tribute to the an older model of  Blue and Red (Purple ) Nexus with the {{champion:117}}  being the little crystals floating above it and the blue being the blocky crystal about to be released from the clamps holding it up to go ka boom{{champion:115}}  2 years ago before the visual update.
